public ref class DataObjectPastingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::DataObjectEventArgs

span.span: Contains arguments for the .
event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 貼上作業已選取要貼上，為的資料格式時，但實際貼上資料之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.

summary.span: Gets or sets a suggested to use for the paste operation.

span.span: Gets or sets a suggested to use for the paste operation.

value.span: 目前建議用於貼上作業。

span.span: The currently suggested to use for the paste operation.

value.span: 取得這個值會傳回目前建議貼上作業。

span.span: Getting this value returns the currently suggested for the paste operation.

value.span: 設定這個值會指定新建議用於貼上作業。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性一開始包含與儲存在中完全相同屬性。Initially this property contains a that is identical to that stored in the property. 貼上的事件處理常式的自訂可以指定新建議貼上設定此屬性。Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested to paste by setting this property. A儲存在這個屬性必須有至少一個資料格式，其中第一個自動套用到當設定這個屬性的屬性。A stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the property when this property is set.

exception.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.

exception.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.
